name: @mikro-nest-forge/mikro-nest-forge
description: CLI tool that generates NestJS DTOs, mappings, and resource scaffolding from MikroORM entities

scripts.copy-templates: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const mkdirp = (p) => fs.mkdirSync(p, { recursive: true }); const copyDir = (src, dest) => { mkdirp(dest); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src, f), path.join(dest, f))); }; copyDir('./src/templates', './dist/templates');"

author: matai
